授業目的: Students are provided with an opportunity to learn the communications skills necessary for success in college (overseas) and beyond.  Focus will be on developing original academic arguments in English, using appropriate evidence to support these arguments.
到達目標: By the end of the semester, students will be able to improve their writing skills as well as critical reading, critical thinking, research and presentation skills.
授業方法: Lectures, presentations, discussions and team contributions

第11回: The writing process: what does it mean to revise?
第12回: Using sources of information/illustrations in scientific and academic writing
トピック.授業外学習2: The completion of writing assignments and reading assignments is essential to pass this class.  Preparation for in-class discussion and an oral presentation is required.

参考書/Reference books2: How to Write a Lot: A Practical Guide to Productive Academic Writing
